# ðŸ“‘ Aesthetics

<a href="2025-aesthetics/index.qmd">
    <button class="button-61">Aesthetics, Fall 2025</button>
</a>

:::{style="text-align: center"}

Following Kendall Walton's point of observations, this course will look at cultural artifacts broadly construed as representational art. Expanding on Walton's investigations, the second half of the semester looks at more contempoary cultural artifacts such video games. Along the way, we discuss personalized artistic experiences made possible through complex algorithms, individual vs. communal experiences in art and other emerging phenomena related to the art world.
